channel.title: How do I
channel.description: Make a shop take ectotokens (code: 4278), i got the shop made just need it to take the tokens lol for 317 or 377 doesnt matter i can mod the code.

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

My bad, In client.java find

Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);

and add

Slot4 = GetItemSlot(4278);

and below

if (Slot2 == -1 && MyShopID == 8) { sM("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; }

add

if (Slot4 == -1 && MyShopID == ##) { sM("You don't have enough ectotoken"); break; }

and go back to

if (playerItemsN[Slot2]

and make it

if (playerItemsN[Slot4]

Read full topic

(this part)

if (playerItemsN[Slot2][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2009, 10:44:27 pm[/size][hr]i made the a Slot5 but it still make me have tokkulâ€¦

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (MyShopID == ##) { if (playerItemsN[Slot2] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(4278, GetItemSlot(4278), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("You need more ectotoken for this item."); } }

Read full topic
